name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Full-Stack Developer with over 10 years of comprehensive experience in developing high-performance applications using **Java**, **C#**, and **Oracle**. Proven expertise in leveraging modern development tools such as **Eclipse**, **JIRA**, **Confluence**, **Git**, and **JUnit** to enhance project efficiency and collaboration. Skilled in unit testing and automation frameworks, including **QF-Test**, ensuring robust application performance. Among my strengths, I possess a solid background in designing and delivering backend and frontend solutions, alongside creating scalable and efficient APIs. Previously contributed to high-impact projects at renowned companies, such as VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska, demonstrating my capacity for excellence in fast-paced environments.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **Java** and **C#** to design and implement robust backend services for document automation and reporting workflows.
Developed and maintained integration solutions with **Oracle** for efficient data retrieval and storage, enhancing overall system performance.
Implemented version control best practices using **Git**, ensuring streamlined collaboration across development teams with **JIRA** for project tracking and **Confluence** for documentation.
Conducted unit testing with **JUnit** to ensure code reliability and performance, achieving a **95%** test coverage across all projects.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to address system integration challenges, ensuring compliance and effective release strategies with a focus on delivering results in **3-6 week** sprints.
Utilized **Eclipse** IDE for efficient project management and development, enhancing productivity and code quality through proper versioning and code reviews.
Executed automated testing strategies with **QF-Test**, reducing manual testing efforts by **40%** and accelerating the verification process.

Utilized **Java** and **C#** to develop robust backend systems, improving performance metrics by **20%** and enhancing user experience during onboarding processes.
Implemented version **3.0** of **Oracle** database solutions to ensure efficient data storage and retrieval, streamlining complex reporting processes by **30%**.
Managed agile project tasks using **JIRA** and **Confluence**, leading to a **15%** increase in project delivery speed through improved team collaboration and documentation.
Employed **Eclipse** as the primary IDE, enhancing development workflow and reducing code errors, which led to a **25%** decrease in bug reports during the testing phase.
Integrated **Git** for version control, enabling seamless collaboration among developers and maintaining code integrity through **20%** fewer merge conflicts.
Conducted comprehensive testing using **JUnit** and automated UI testing with **QF-Test**, achieving a **98%** pass rate in quality assurance checks before production deployments.
Fostered cross-functional collaboration with the frontend team, ensuring successful feature releases and system integrations, ultimately improving overall product quality and user satisfaction.

Utilized **Java**, **C#**, and **Oracle** to develop and maintain robust backend services for trade execution and portfolio management.
Designed and implemented REST APIs and frontend integrations with **Eclipse**, ensuring efficient data delivery and seamless user experience on the trading platform.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams using **JIRA** and **Confluence** to enhance project tracking and communication, leading to a 30% improvement in project delivery timelines.
Employed **Git** for version control, facilitating collaborative development and code management across a team of 9 developers.
Developed automated test scripts using **JUnit** to maintain high code quality, achieving over 85% test coverage in critical system components.
Implemented advanced testing scenarios with **QF-Test**, resulting in a 20% reduction in post-deployment defects and improved system reliability.
Streamlined project workflows leading to a 25% increase in overall team productivity using agile methodologies.
